She then continued on with bringing the groceries in as she had four bags left to bring in. Once she did that she took all the cold food and etc into the fridge, the cupboard, and so on. When she put the last item in the cupboard she then walked over to the living room, sat down, pulled out a book and began to read it as she chewed on the piece of gum. What happens next?

1453213212112121.content:
As Dash is about to make a super-speedy world’s record of his own, Violet is peeking behind a bush, invisible to the naked eye, no pun intended.

“Here we go. Preteen heartthrob Dash “The Bullet” Parr, is going to jump over 3 school buses. Can he make it?” Dash announced as he got ready, seeing the three buses loaded with trouble. Inside each bus was tons of homework, but it’s not even his own.

Violet brought out a simple ketchup bottle. Nothing special, just an ordinary tomato condiment.

“Hee hee. He’s gonna get paybacked!” Violet giggled. As she watched Dash make a running start, she got ready to pounce to the end zone.

Violet is already thinking about the prank Dash did to her, and she could never forgive him. Dash ran so fast, he jumped up the ramp and successfully jumped over the buses with ease. He poses and takes a few bows. However, he is vulnerable, as Violet suddenly took the ketchup bottle down his suit and began to squirt.

“Whoa! Hey!” Exclaimed Dash as he felt the red ketchup gushing through his suit collar and oozing down his waist. The almost half liter bottle is pouring red seasoning down his suit and with each squish and squeeze as well. In just a minute, the bottle is empty and Dash felt like he has a beer belly.

“Violet! What was that for?!” Shouted Dash in embarrassment.

“Oh, I’m sorry. Is that not enough?” Taunted Violet with a mischievous, but innocent smile. She used her powers to restrain his feet and hands, immobilizing the young speedster. A big bag was taken and she pulled out...
1453213212112121.title: It does match his suit’s color

Violet heads to a ketchup storage
14532132121121211.content:
Another ketchup bottle, except it is a larger variety. And that is immediately going down the front of Dash’s packed suit, right in his suit collar.

“This feels weird even for me...” Dash said as he cringed from the cool ketchup touching his skin.

“Get used to it, tomato boy.” Snickered Violet as she squirted more and more. The ketchup bottle is a whole one and a half liter in capacity. Suddenly Dash’s suit began to stretch out a bit, but not before Violet taped the gaps of his suit closed, His suit is taking on a balloon shape, and Violet adored the sight of it.

“Just keep growing for me, my ketchup brother...” Said Violet in amusement, rubbing the blob that is his red suit. Dash is feeling uneasy at this, and then saw Violet dumping the last of the ketchup from the bottle, an indication that he is home free. However, that is not to be as Violet brought 10 more bottles the same size as the most recent one. Dash stares in disbelief as one of the bottles went down his collar again. Violet wasted no time, pouring the ketchup like a boss as Dash’s suit has swollen to as big as Violet herself. But 9 bottles remain and the dilemma is just the beginning.

“Stop...” begged Dash. But Violet refused and simply continued to dump the red seasoning into his suit. After the second bottle, his suit filled to the size of a car. Violet proceeded to dump two bottles at once, doubling the speed and Dash’s woes. Halfway into it, Dash’s suit is so big, a standard house cannot fit him. Violet smiles as he vibrated his massive suit, but she thinks it could get a LOT bigger. In no time, the rest of the 10 bottles are dumped into Dash’s suit, which is as big as half a public park.

“We’re just getting started...” Taunted Violet.
14532132121121211.title: Another ketchup bottle, but bigger

choices: Deeply soft; time to put more ketchup in
145321321211212111.content:
Dash is still feeling uncomfortable, and he is going to feel even more so, as Violet brought out even bigger ketchup bottles from the big bag.

“Oh no...” Said Dash in shock.

Each of the bottles are as big as a car, and that’s an understatement. Violet cannot wait a minute as she got to business with the first ketchup bottle, putting it down the front of Dash’s suit collar.

“This is my favorite part...” Taunted Violet as she kept squirting. Dash’s suit kept oozing with ketchup as it stretched further and further. If that was the strength of one bottle, all of them would be something to not forget. The very thought of it intrigued Violet as she put the rest down his brother’s suit. Some in his pant legs and in his sleeves. Violet watched in utter satisfaction as his brother’s suit filled much further with ease.

“Stop...” Said Dash, moaning from the uncomfortable predicament.

Violet simply refused, and this is a bad sign for Dash. He had no choice but to feel ketchup gushing from outside of his body, but inside his red suit. Violet laid back on his suit, and it felt...
